thread.title: RIP Jerry Parr, the man who may have saved Pres Reagan's life | Opinion - Conservative
thread.title_full: RIP Jerry Parr, the man who may have saved Pres Reagan's life | Opinion - Conservative

author: beforeitsnews.com
title: RIP Jerry Parr, the man who may have saved Pres Reagan's life | Opinion - Conservative
text:
(Before It's News)
As we all know, President Reagan was coming out of a hotel when shots were fired. It’s very likely that Jerry Parr, in charge of the president that day, saved his life.
We thank Mr Parr for his service as a member of the Secret Service. Our best wishes to his wife and family.
Jerry Parr, Secret Service Agent Who Helped Save Reagan, Dies at 85 …. http://t.co/H8EEqV9qM9
— Silvio Canto, Jr. (@SCantojr) October 10, 2015
